longDescription: Model: DSCRX100B. <b>Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 Highlights</b><br><br><ul class="noindent"><li>20.2MP 1" Exmor CMOS Sensor</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>BIONZ Image Processor</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T* f/1.8-4.9 Lens</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>28-100mm (35mm Equivalent)</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>3.0" 1,229k-Dot Xtra Fine LCD Monitor</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Full HD 1080p Video Recording at 60 fps</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>ISO 6400 and 10 fps Continuous Shooting</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Manual Control Ring and PASM Settings</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Aluminum Body with Built-In Pop-Up Flash</li><li style="list-style: none"><br><br><b>Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 Bundle includes</b><br><br></li><li>Focus 5 Piece Digital Camera Accessory Kit</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Focus Deluxe 8 Inch Table Tripod</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Sony DSC-TX30/B 18 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.3-Inch OLED (Black)</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Secure Digital SD/SDHC/MMC 2.0 USB Card Reader</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Foam Floating Strap for Camera - Yellow</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Focus Micro-fiber Cleaning Cloth</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Sony 16GB microSDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>FC-CA15B-M Standard Medium Digital Camera Case</li><li style="list-style: none"><br><br>Housed in a sophisticated aluminum body, the Sony DSC-RX100 Digital Camera (Black) features a 20.2 megapixel Exmor CMOS image sensor that excels in ultra low-light situations. Plus, it supports a full range of controls for video and still shooting that range from iAUTO to P/A/S/M (Program, Aperture Priority, Shutter Priority and Manual).<br><br>The RX100 is loaded with shot-enhancing features and high-quality components. The camera also features Optical SteadyShot with Active Mode, which eliminates blurry images when you're walking with the camera. You can use the Auto Portrait Framing function to capture an additional, beautifully framed and balanced full resolution portrait, when you're out shooting stills. longDescription: <br><b>HP 15.6" 15-F387WM Laptop PC:</b><br><br><b>Key Features and Benefits:</b><ul><li>AMD A8-7410 processor<br>2.20GHz (with Max Turbo Speed of 2.5GHz),<br><br></li><li>4GB DDR3 SDRAM system memory<br>Gives you the power to handle most power-hungry applications and tons of multimedia work<br><br></li><li>500GB SATA hard drive<br>Store 333,000 photos, 142,000 songs or 263 hours of HD video and more<br><br></li><li>SuperMulti DVD burner<br>Watch movies and read and write CDs and DVDs in multiple formats<br><br></li><li>10/100Base-T Fast Ethernet, 802.11b/g/n Wireless LAN<br>Connect to a broadband modem with wired Ethernet or wirelessly connect to a WiFi signal or hotspot with the 802.11b/g/n connection built into your PC<br><br></li><li>15.6" HD WLED-backlit touchscreen<br>AMD Radeon R5 Graphics</li></ul><br><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Webcam</li><li>Multi-in-1 memory card reader</li><li>2 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB 2.0 port, 1 x HDMI port, 1 x Ethernet port, 1 x headphone/microphone jack, 1 x DC-in</li><li>3-cell lithium-ion polymer battery</li><li>5.67 lbs, 0.97" x 15.18" x 10.16"</li></ul><br><b>Software:</b><ul><li>Genuine Microsoft Windows 10 Home</li><li>Wild Tangent Games</li><li>HP Support Assistant, HP Recovery Manager</li><li>HP ePrint</li><li>TripAdvisor</li><li>Netflix, VUDU</li><li>CyberLink PhotoDirector, PowerDirector</li><li>CyberLink Power Media Player</li><li>CyberLink YouCam</li><li>Snapfish</li><li>Dropbox</li><li>30-day McAfee LiveSafe trial</li><li>Backup and Restore options built into Windows allow you to create safety copies of your most important personal files, so you're always prepared for the worst</li></ul><br><b>Support and Warranty:</b><ul><li>1-year limited hardware warranty; 24/7 technical assistance available online or toll-free by phone</li><li>Restore discs are not included (unless specified by supplier). We recommend you use the installed software to create your own restore and backup DVD the first week you use the computer.</li></ul><br><b>What's In The Box:</b><ul><li>Power cord and AC adapter</li><li>3-cell battery</li><li>Quick Start Guide</li></ul><br><b><i>To see the manufacturer's specifications for this product, click <a href="http://i.walmart.com/i/rb/0088989483533.pdf" target="_blank">here</a>.<br><br>To see a list of our PC Accessories, click <a href="http://www.walmart.com/cp/accessories-peripherals/132959" target="_blank">here</a>.<br><br>Trade in your used computer and electronics for more cash to spend at Walmart.
